languages.text: "Но мы верим, что сможем, и это — главное. И если мы справимся... мы обретем несравненную силу. И станем щитом против бед и ненастий, в каком бы виде они не проявлялись".

"But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."
languages.original_text: "Но мы верим, что сможем, и это — главное. И если мы справимся... мы обретем несравненную силу. И станем щитом против бед и ненастий, в каком бы виде они не проявлялись".

traits.locale_text: "But we believe in ourselves, and that is what matters. And if we succeed... we will obtain peerless power. And we will become the shield against any threat in any form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "But we believe in ourselves, and that is what matters. And if we succeed... we will obtain peerless power. And we will become the shield against any threat in any form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "But we believe in ourselves, and that is what matters. And if we succeed... we will obtain peerless power. And we will become the shield against any threat in any form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "But we believe in ourselves, and that is what matters. And if we succeed... we will obtain peerless power. And we will become the shield against any threat in any form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

traits.locale_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: « Mais nous nous en croyons capables, et c'est cette conviction qui nous pousse à essayer. Si nous réussissons... nous acquerrons un pouvoir sans commune mesure. Nous deviendrons un bouclier contre toutes les menaces, quelle que soit leur forme. »
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."

traits.locale_text: « Mais nous nous en croyons capables, et c'est cette conviction qui nous pousse à essayer. Si nous réussissons... nous acquerrons un pouvoir sans commune mesure. Nous deviendrons un bouclier contre toutes les menaces, quelle que soit leur forme. »
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: «Pero creemos en nosotros mismos y eso es lo que nos lleva a intentarlo. Y si triunfamos... obtendremos un poder inigualable. Nos convertiremos en un escudo contra toda amenaza, sin importar la forma que tome».
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."

traits.locale_text: «Pero creemos en nosotros mismos y eso es lo que importa. Y si triunfamos... obtendremos un poder inigualable. Nos convertiremos en un escudo contra toda amenaza, sin importar la forma que tome».
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: “但我们相信我们做得到，这便是我们的动力。如果成功的话……我们会获得无与伦比的力量。接下来，无论遇到什么威胁，我们都会成为强大的堡垒。”
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."

traits.locale_text: “但我们相信我们自己，这才是最重要的事情。如果成功的话……我们会获得无与伦比的力量。接下来，无论遇到什么威胁，我们都会成为强大的盾牌。”
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Doch wir glauben, dass wir es können, und allen das lässt es uns versuchen. Und wenn es uns gelingt ... erlangen wir unvorstellbare Macht. Wir werden ein Schild gegen jede Gefahr sein, egal, in welcher Gestalt sie sich auch manifestieren mag."
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wir glauben an uns, und allein das zählt. Und wenn wir Erfolg haben ... erhalten wir unerreichte Macht. Und wir werden zum Schild gegen jede Gefahr, in welcher Form sie sich auch manifestieren mag."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: 「しかし、我々はできると信じている。そして成功すれば…比類なき力を手に入れることができる。そして我々は、どのような脅威に対しても、どのような形であれ、盾となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、我々は自分たちを信じている。そして成功すれば…比類なき力を手に入れることができる。そして我々は、どのような脅威に対しても、どのような形であれ、盾となるのだ」
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Fakat başaracağımıza inanıyoruz ve bu inanç, denemek için bize şevk veriyor. Başarılı olursak... Eşi benzeri olmayan bir güce sahip olacağız. Ne şekilde doğarsa doğsun tüm tehlikelere karşı bir kalkan olacağız."
languages.original_text: "But we believe that we can, and that is what drives us to try. And if we succeed... we will obtain power beyond compare. We will become a shield against any threat, in whatever form it may manifest itself."
